solution_line_template: Each gust blows the leaf forward {feet_per_gust} feet, so {num_gusts} gusts will blow it forward {feet_per_gust} * {num_gusts} = <<{feet_per_gust}*{num_gusts}={total_forward}>>{total_forward} feet.

Each swirl after a gust blows it back {feet_per_swirl} feet, so {num_gusts} swirls will blow it back {feet_per_swirl} * {num_gusts} = <<{num_gusts}*{feet_per_swirl}={total_backward}>>{total_backward} feet.
After {num_gusts} gusts, the leaf has traveled {total_forward} - {total_backward} = <<{total_forward}-{total_backward}={net_distance}>>{net_distance} feet down the sidewalk.
